name: Zelta Zombie Survival
description:
Zelta Zombie Survival is a simple mini game where you are assigned to survive while hordes of zombies want to chew on you.

This game is made in 2 day(s) and wont receive content updates , unless for fixes.

Features :

Point and click turn based strategic survival game.

Loot several locations and survive longer.

Upgrade your base to further help you.

Defend against the hungry horde.

3 game modes including a tutorial.
